Scheme.select: select t.post_id,t.user_id,t.content,t.attch_id,t.project_id,t.root_id,t.private, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.user_id) as user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.user_id) as user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.project_id) as project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.root_id) as root_project_name from t_post t left join t_post_send a on t.post_id=a.post_id where 1=1 and 20 >= ROWNUM and (instr('#project_id#', t.project_id) > 0 or instr('#project_id#', t.root_id) > 0 or instr('#project_id#', a.send_project_id) > 0) order by t.time desc

select t.post_id,t.user_id,t.content,t.attch_id,t.project_id,t.root_id,t.private, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.user_id) as user_name, (select small_head from t_user where user_id=t.user_id) as user_head, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.project_id) as project_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.root_id) as root_project_name from t_post t left join t_post_send a on t.post_id=a.post_id where 1=1 and 20 >= ROWNUM and to_date('#time#','yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') > t.time and (instr('#project_id#', t.project_id) > 0 or instr('#project_id#', t.root_id) > 0 or instr('#project_id#', a.send_project_id) > 0) order by t.time desc

select t.*,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.send_user_id) as user_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.send_project_id) as project_name from t_post_send t where 1=1 [and post_id='#post_id#']

select t.comment_id,t.post_id,t.user_id,t.content,t.attch_id,t.project_id,t.root_id, (to_char(t.time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')) as time,(select user_name from t_user where user_id=t.user_id) as user_name, (select project_name from t_project where project_id=t.project_id) as project_name from t_comment t where instr('#post_id#', t.post_id) > 0
